fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Redhorn Stonethresher__
His signature, suits him perfectly.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Whiteblind__
Highly synergetic craftable 4-star Claymore.
__Serpent Spine, Beacon of the Reed Sea, Wolf's Gravestone__
All great options, as Itto can benefit from ATK%, DEF% and CRIT stats.

fields.value: Use 2-pc Husk with 2-pc Emblem **or** 2-pc Archaic Petra
